text:
I’m doing some workflow stuff and definitely coming across a lot of limitations i’ve got about 3 webhooks so far to make it do what I want it to.

Add details to a specific deal add a second contact to the deal, add the extra details the second contact has given to the deal. Webhook all around! at least the API’s seem fairly comprehensive
Okay, long time stalker first time question. :slightly_smiling_face:

Is there a way to export template details out from the dev tools like templates with most dependencies and or the pages tied to those templates? Doing a massive menu change and knowing this information would be vital.

Hey George!!! I’ll ask around internally about this and get back to you. I dont think something like getting the template’s dependents or the live pages that are using it is part of any of the API’s (specially looking at the “get templates” API: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/templates/get_templates>) but let me double check. When I hear back I’ll let you know.
